message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40. I'm willing to negotiate.
Your offer was a bit too favorable towards you. How about a 55/45 split?
I'm willing to compromise. 57-43 is a fair split considering the inflation.
The inflation is starting to hurt you more than me. I'll meet you halfway between our last offers at 56/44.
Inflation is taking its toll, I'm willing to take a smaller share to end this sooner.
